body:
Comment 1: 
Thank you for the reproducible example. This makes it easy to convert to a (failing)
unit test.

(removing the go 1.1 tag as this is not directly related to the core std lib)
_Labels changed: added **priority-soon**, removed **priority-triage**, **go1.1**._ _Owner changed to @davecheney._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
